Powder
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 13 - Dissolve or mix with water before taking

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Label 32 - Contains aspirin. Do not take anything else containing aspirin while taking this medicine

Excipients

May contain

Aspartame

Metoclopramide hydrochloride 10 mg

ASPIRIN WITH METOCLOPRAMIDE
